blasphemy.question: Did you, in conversation or through speech, swear to God?
blasphemy.description: This sin violates the Second Commandment by treating God's holy name with disrespect rather than reverence.

extracted_data_phrases: while knowingly in a state of sin
blasphemy.question: Did you receive Holy Communion while knowingly in a state of sin, potentially disrespecting the sacrament by your actions?
blasphemy.description: This mortal sin is a form of sacrilege and profanes the real presence of Christ and shows grave disrespect for the sacrament by receiving unworthily.

extracted_data_phrases: while knowingly in a state of sin
particularly after engaging in activities that may have compromised your spiritual well - being
in activities that may have compromised your spiritual well - being
blasphemy.question: Did you receive Holy Communion while knowingly in a state of sin, particularly after engaging in activities that may have compromised your spiritual well-being?
blasphemy.description: This mortal sin is a form of sacrilege and profanes the real presence of Christ and shows grave disrespect for the sacrament by receiving unworthily.

extracted_data_phrases: at a time when I was knowingly struggling to prioritize my spiritual life amidst worldly commitments
blasphemy.question: Did I receive Holy Communion at a time when I was knowingly struggling to prioritize my spiritual life amidst worldly commitments?
blasphemy.description: This mortal sin is a form of sacrilege and profanes the real presence of Christ and shows grave disrespect for the sacrament by receiving unworthily.

extracted_data_phrases: regarding leadership roles or positions of authority in various aspects of life
within community organizations , or even in family dynamics
ambition.question: Did I let my desire for power and dominance influence my decisions regarding leadership roles or positions of authority in various aspects of life, such as at work, within community organizations, or even in family dynamics?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

extracted_data_phrases: for power influence how I lead , prioritize , or treat others in various aspects of my life
in various aspects of my life
ambition.question: Did I let my desire for power influence how I lead, prioritize, or treat others in various aspects of my life?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

extracted_data_phrases: in various areas of life , such as career and community involvement
such as career and community involvement
over the well - being and dignity of others
ambition.question: Did my pursuit of success and influence in various areas of life, such as career and community involvement, ever lead me to compromise or prioritize my own interests over the well-being and dignity of others?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

greed.question: Did I make accumulating wealth and possessions a driving force in my life?
greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

greed.question: Did I make the accumulation of wealth and possessions a central concern in my life?
greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

extracted_data_phrases: through my words , actions , or decisions
oppression.question: Did I mistreat others through my words, actions, or decisions?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

oppression.question: Have you used your authority, position, or influence to mistreat, harass, or discriminate against others?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

oppression.question: Have I unjustly used my authority, power, or influence to mistreat others?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: from my own abilities rather than God 's providence
autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the good things in my life, thinking they came from my own abilities rather than God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the many comforts and successes in my life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

presumption.question: Did I assume that my success in life and my blessings are solely due to my own efforts, abilities, and determination, forgetting to acknowledge God's providence and guidance?
presumption.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I felt envious towards others' successes, and secretly wished they would not be blessed?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: even in areas unrelated to my own pursuits
envy.question: Have I secretly wished that others would lose their success or achievements, even in areas unrelated to my own pursuits?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others using unbecoming language, thereby violating their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: especially in situations where my emotions or frustrations got the better of me
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with vulgarity, especially in situations where my emotions or frustrations got the better of me?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
to social gatherings or special occasions
gluttony.question: Have I overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially when it comes to social gatherings or special occasions?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially when enjoying leisure activities such as outdoor pursuits, sporting events, or social gatherings?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: over my family 's financial obligations or needs
prodigality.question: Have I allowed gambling to take precedence over my family's financial obligations or needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I allowed my entertainment and leisure activities to take precedence over my financial responsibilities, potentially putting my family's well-being at risk?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: to recreational activities over my financial responsibilities
prodigality.question: Have I given excessive and wasteful precedence to recreational activities over my financial responsibilities?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing others ' private affairs or discussing their faults
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs or discussing their faults, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' personal lives, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did I work on a Sunday out of necessity, when possible alternatives were available?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: onto feelings of rage towards others
rather than seeking reconciliation and understanding
anger.question: Have I nursed anger or held onto feelings of rage towards others, rather than seeking reconciliation and understanding?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
